sqlMap.select: SELECT T.RSPDATA, T.ID, T.IF_NO, T.RSP_RESULT, T.CARD_PRODUCT_NAME, T.USERFLAG FROM JC_RSP_DATA t WHERE T.SESSIONID = #sessionID# AND T.STATE = '0' ORDER BY T.UPDATE_TIME
SELECT T.NAME "name", T.AID "aid", T.APPSIZE "appSize", T.MAYOPERATE "mayOperate", T.SUPPLIERNAME "supplierName", T.FEEDESC "feeDesc" FROM JC_RSP_SUB_DATA T WHERE T.ID = #id#
SELECT PARAMVALUE FROM EOP_PARAM WHERE PARAMCODE = 'jccard.face.url'
SELECT PARAMVALUE FROM EOP_PARAM WHERE PARAMCODE = 'jccard.face.port'
